header_text: You're called to stand up and introduce yourself to a new team member at your department's meeting. You stumble as you get up from your chair. When you think about everyone seeing you stumble, you feel embarrassed.

elements.Text: Are you okay with people seeing you stumble?

elements.name: You're called to stand up and introduce yourself to a new team member at your department's meeting. You stumble as you get up from your chair. When you think about everyone seeing you stumble, you feel embarrassed._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
